attributes.action: Keep schools and educational institutes open during lockdowns.
attributes.additional_details: Education is key. Children need routine and not going to school will have a greater impact mentally and physically. Online learning isn’t the same.
attributes.background: There is a petition started to close schools. We are against this. Schools and educational institutes need to be kept open regardless.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558050
